訦字的基本解释

訦
chén
诚实不欺。
愤怒呵斥。

訦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chén］
［《廣韻》氏任切，平侵，禪。］
［《廣韻》常枕切，上寢，禪。］
诚信。

訦字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　訦； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1150第11
【唐韻】是吟切【廣韻】氏任切【集韻】時任切，?甚平聲。【揚子·方言】燕代東齊謂信曰訦。　又人名。與訦，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【玉篇】市荏切【唐韻】常枕切，?音甚。信也。　又【集韻】式荏切，音審。義同。　【集韻】與諶愖忱?同。

訦字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
訦字的起名意思

指诚实不欺。

訦
Basic explanation of words
訦
chén
Be honest and not deceive.
Angrily scolded.
訦
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chén］
["Guangyun" Clan Renqie, flat invasion, Zen. ]
["Guangyun" often cuts the pillow, goes to bed, and Zen. ]
Integrity.
訦
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　訦; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 1150 to 11
[Tang Yun] is Yin Qi [Guang Yun]'s Ren Qi [Ji Yun] when he was cutting,? Very flat sound. [Yangtze Dialect] The Yan Dynasty Dongqi prescribes the letter and says 訦.　Another name. And 訦, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Jade articles] City 荏切 [Tang Yun] often pillow cut,? The sound is very high. Letter also.　[Jiyun] style 荏切, sound review. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】Same as Chen Yanchen?
